name: Gamiflux Server
detailed_description:
Gamiflux Server streams games from your Personal Computer. With the help of Gamiflux Server, you can play PC games with mouse&keyboard on your notebook/tablet or with controller on your phone/console.

Gamiflux Server is just one part of the solution, because it's only the server for streaming games to your target device. You have to also install the Gamiflux client app on your target device for receiving games stream and sending input. The client app is distributed on Microsoft App Store because it's an UWP app.

To get the best streaming performance, a high end gaming PC is highly recommended for Gamiflux Server.

The solution is now in beta and needs bug fix. Please be patient if it doesn't work at the start or has any performance issue. Send our devs email telling us the issues to help us repair them in time.

Features


  • Add games into the server.
  • Launch games from the server.
  • Stream games from the server.

short_description: Gamiflux Server streams games from your Personal Computer to help you play PC games anywhere.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
